item.title: i cant see weapons :(
item.dc:creator: spoolboyy
item.description:
OK - so this worked for me, so maybe it can help someone else.

went to developer console and typed “r_drawviewmodels 1” (without the quotes of course)

went to an office and picked up a chair. when I threw the chair away, my pistol showed up.

Apparently, this was nothing a temper tantrum couldn’t solve.
